title: MARKETING MANAGER
company_info: No information added.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Marketing Manager Job Description
We are seeking an innovative marketing manager to promote our company's brand and services. In this role, you will be optimizing our marketing strategies, managing the marketing department's budget and staff, as well as preparing forecasts. To ensure success, you will need extensive knowledge of marketing strategies and the ability to identify new business leads. An outstanding marketing manager will be someone whose expertise translates into increased brand awareness and profitability.
Marketing Manager Responsibilities
Evaluating and optimizing marketing and pricing strategies.
Analyzing market trends and preparing forecasts.
Generating new business leads.
Develop strategies and tactics to get the word out about our company and drive qualified traffic to our front door
Deploy successful marketing campaigns and own their implementation from ideation to execution
Experiment with a variety of organic and paid acquisition channels like content creation, content curation, pay per click campaigns, event management, publicity, social media, lead generation campaigns, copywriting, performance analysis
Produce valuable and engaging content for our website and blog that attracts and converts our target groups
Build strategic relationships and partner with key industry players, agencies and vendors
Prepare and monitor the marketing budget on a quarterly and annual basis and allocate funds wisely
Oversee and approve marketing material, from website banners to hard copy brochures and case studies
Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns, gain insight and assess against goals
Analyze consumer behavior and adjust email and advertising campaigns accordingly
Marketing Manager Requirements
A Bachelor’s degree in marketing, business or any other relevant field
Sound understanding of marketing fundamentals and tactics
Creative thinking and problem-solving ability
Leadership and project management skills
Knowledge of digital marketing and social media marketing strategies
Excellent verbal and non-verbal communication skills
Proficiency with marketing tools and software
Proficient in marketing research and statistical analysis
The ability to work under pressure.
Availability to work within opening hours (e.g. evenings, holidays, weekends).

title: Senior Marketing Manager
company_info: Aspire specialises in recruiting for the media and marketing communications industry. We help change people's lives and improve business performance. We have a 96% success rate of placing the right people into the right role. We act as both a brand embassador for our employer customers, and a trusted recruitment partner for our candidates. We are a 'high touch' consultancy who believes in meeting face to face in order to fully understand your requirements, whether it is hiring new staff or looking for the next career move. Established since 1992, Aspire has over two decades of heritage in our specialist areas, so our dedicated consltas are well positioned to help. Aspire has developed an international presence with offices in Singapore, Hong Kong, London and Manchester for employers and individuals with global aspirations. Aspire has been operating in Asia since November 2011, facilitating the movement of talent, locally, regionally and at a global level. Aspire is also ISO 9001 accredited, an investors in People Gold Award Company, a Sunday Times Top 100 company to work, members of APSCo Asia and we are always interested in talking to media & marketing communications professionals as well as those who are considering a career in recruitment with us at Aspire.
job_category: Advertising / Media, Marketing / Public Relations, Sales / Retail
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Our client is part of one of the world's largest and leading exhibition organizers and is embarking on a remarkable journey of growth and expansion.

They are now looking for a Senior Marketing Manager to join their expanding team in Singapore!

In this role, you will:

Help shape marketing strategies and practices while working closely across teams to ensure effective marketing and data management. Understanding client-specific marketing requirements is a key aspect.
Develop marketing strategies for existing brands and new show launches, working closely with Executive Directors on budget optimisation and effectiveness.
Coordinate marketing timelines, and oversee vendors including registration, business matching, staff, design, PR, media, data management, and systems (CRM).
Manage data system, data cleaning, coding and management across all portfolio events.
Define KPIs with the marketing manager, including pre-registrations, on-site visitors, and rebooking.
Handle corporate marketing, overseeing their social media platforms to promote their event portfolio. (MICE/event industries)
Provide post-show reports for business insights and analyze data to support development
Your experience:
4+ years experience in events marketing. (B2B and tradeshow events)
Experience collaborating with local and regional MICE partners
Able to work with offices across Europe, Asia, and the Americas.
If interested, please apply!

title: MARKETING ASSISTANT MANAGER
company_info: No information added.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Marketing Assistant Manager Job Description
Our company is looking to hire a marketing assistant who will be working closely with our marketing team to develop and implement marketing plans and strategies for our brands. As a successful hire, you will be tasked with helping identify marketing trends and opportunities for growth, as well as creating marketing materials such as white papers and case studies. You will be giving presentations about our ongoing campaigns and provide administrative support to our marketing and sales teams.
To be chosen for this role, you must have a bachelor's degree in marketing, business, or a related field. Prior work experience in administration, sales, or marketing is a plus. Effective written and verbal communication skills and a high level of attention to detail are both important keys to success in this role.
Marketing Assistant Manager Responsibilities:
• Collaborating with the marketing manager, internal teams, clients and partners on marketing strategy.
• Helping identify marketing trends and key opportunities for innovation.
• Learning and working with various types of software for digital marketing.
• Working closely with sales and marketing department.
• Creating marketing materials such as white papers, case studies, and presentations.
• Giving presentations.
• Maintaining a marketing database.
• Providing administrative support to the marketing and sales team.
• Preparing, formatting and editing a range of documents.
• Understanding company product and brand.
• General office duties.
• Creating and interpreting a variety of reports.
• Organizing market research.
• Analyzing questionnaires and other forms of feedback.
• Updating social media accounts.
• Perform any other duties assigned by the director.
Marketing Assistant Manager Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree in marketing, business or related field.
• Administration or sales and marketing assistant experience.
• Effective written and verbal communication skills.
• A high level of attention to detail.
• Ability to work effectively within a team and independently.
• Experience using computers for a variety of tasks.
• Competency in Microsoft applications including Word, Excel, and Outlook.
• Good organization skills.
• Related job and internship experience.
• Digital marketing experience.
• The ability to work under pressure.
• Availability to work within opening hours (e.g. evenings, holidays, weekends).

Roles & Responsibilities
Our client is a Global MNC, one of the leading players in the IT Electronics sector. Due to business needs, they are now recruiting a Digital Marketing Manager to be part of their team for ongoing transformation projects. They are located in the East – easily accessible.

Responsibilities:
Create/Implement marketing strategies in line with the company's business objectives.
Translate business objectives into feasible digital marketing strategies, enable to company to drive results.
Handle digital marketing campaigns across multiple channels (eg. Performance media, Social media, and email marketing etc.)
Measure and enhance various campaign performances using tech stark tools and analysis
Provide insights and recommendations for improving ecommerce sales performance.

Minimum 5 years of digital marketing experience in the relevant industries

title: SALES AND MARKETING MANAGER
company: RAINBOW TRADING & SUPER MART PTE. LTD.
company_info: No information added.
job_category: Accounting / Auditing / Taxation, Customer Service, Information Technology, Sales / Retail
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description:

Develop and implement marketing strategies, identify and evaluate business opportunities and foster strong customer relationships
Researching and developing marketing opportunities and plans, understanding consumer requirements, identifying market trends, and suggesting system improvements to achieve the company's marketing goals
Analysing budgets, preparing annual budget plans, scheduling expenditures, and ensuring that the sales team meets their quotas and goals
Study market research and trends to determine consumer demand, potential sales volumes and effect of competitors' operations on sales
Gathering, investigating, and summarizing market data and trends to draft reports
Implementing new sales plans and advertising, identifying opportunities and strategies to increase sales
Help establish Glory Trading’s import and export wholesale business of Indian/Bangladesh household and groceries products
Evaluate Glory Trading’s current inventory and make suggestions for continuous improvement based on market research and understanding of the purchasing habits consumers
Establish new sourcing networks and strengthen existing supplier relationships for household and grocery goods desirable to our customers
Anticipate and resolve potential problems / issues work with seasonal marketing budget
Maintain comprehensive knowledge of and ensure compliance with relevant regulatory rules and standards
Maintaining relationships with important clients by making regular visits, understanding their needs, and anticipating new marketing opportunities
Performs other job-related duties as assigned by Company

JOB REQUIREMENTS:
Minimum Masters Degree in Business or related discipline
Minimum 4 years of experience in B2B/B2C sales, Indian/Bangladesh wholesale brand consumer products with a preference for the industry
Preferably with experience in wholesale/retail packaging (household & groceries) and good knowledge in
Indian/Bangladesh Wholesale household and groceries products distributions through various channels
Preferably bilingual to liaise with Indian/Bangladesh speaking suppliers and vendors in view of working/business environment communication.
Willing to do rotating shift work and flexibility to work late evenings
Able to work longer hours with prolonged period of standing
Must be willing to work on weekends/PH. (Strictly off on week days)
Field work required. Need to do delivery if driver is off / medical leave or urgency of goods when required
Must have knowledge to control storage room temperatures for frozen products, vegetables etc
Able to withstand considerable exterior noise and extreme temperature fluctuations in warehouse
Strong market analysis and strategy planning skills
Proactive person who has positive attitude and responsible for sales targets
Ability to work under pressure, in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines

title: SALES & MARKETING DIRECTOR (SEMICONDUCTOR)
company_info: No information added.
job_category: Customer Service, Manufacturing, Marketing / Public Relations, Sales / Retail, Precision Engineering
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Smartt Precision Mfg Pte Ltd (SMARTT)
is a Singapore-based high-growth start-up company in leading principal activity & technology in manufacturing of precision components of semiconductor devices/equipment worldwide.
As a One-Stop Vertical Integration Capabilities & Fast-Expanding Semiconductor Equipment Player, SMARTTexperts in the development and innovative production of a high-technology, customized products across the global. SMARTT provides our partners with high quality products and solutions at the highest performance standards, in the quickest time-to-market. All manufacture steps complete internally; enable SMARTTto build complicated SEMI parts for customers in High efficiency, High Quality (Repeatability) & Fast Speed with Competitive Cost.


SUMMARY
You are responsible to lead all aspects of Sales and Marketing strategies, overseeing the planning and development of marketing plans to drive the highest possible sales performance, implements programs, projects or processes for an assigned customer account(s) so as to ensure the room revenue is met.

RESONSIBLE:

1. Plan & Develop Sales & Market Marketing Strategy
Responsible for formulating the overall marketing strategy & plans and development an execute marketing plans and campaigns to align with marketing objectives & achieve KPIs and business targets.
Manage and support current & new programs and management initiatives with the headquarter.
Oversee the implementation of new marketing strategies, communicating key dates and milestones to leadership and cross-functional stakeholders.
Stay updated on international semiconductor market developments and actions of competitors, analyze market trends, adjust marketing strategies to maintain the company's competitive advantage.
Adjust and optimize marketing strategies, make informed decisions and adapt strategies as needed to ensure the company's products and services meet the market needs.
Make recommendations for improvement based on the results of marketing initiatives.
2. Expand Sales & Market Share
Take charge of exploring the overseas study market, expanding customer channels, establishing and maintaining strong partnerships, increasing business opportunities, and achieving sales targets.
Analyse market trends, customer requirements and find opportunities to grow customers base through product position and differentiation.
Manage key accounts and develop new accounts.
Maintain relationships with important clients by making regular visits, understand their needs, and anticipate new marketing opportunities.
Actively look for possibilities to upsell and cross-sell to existing customers.
3. Brand Promotion
Responsible for promoting the company's brand in the international market, enhancing brand awareness and reputation, and establishing the company's leadership position in the overseas study market.
Establishes and controls organization-wide marketing activities, including product development, pricing and identifying new business opportunities.
4. Budget Management
Responsible for budget preparation and implementation within the marketing department, ensuring completion of marketing and promotional activities within the budget scope and appropriate allocation of resources to achieve expected returns.
Manage marketing budgets within the campaigns and optimize spending.
Analyse budgets, prepare annual budget plans, schedule expenditures, and ensure that the sales team meets their goals.
5. Team Management
Lead, train, and motivate the sales& marketing department team to ensure team members have clear objectives, efficient coordination, and achieve individual and team performance goals.
6. Stakeholder/Customers/External Parties Engagement
Engage with internal and external stakeholders, representing the organization at conferences, networking events, and industry forums.
Develop, build and sustain strong relationships with industry professionals, clients, vendors, and partners.

REQUIREMENT:
Degree qualification in any Business/Marketing/International Business/Supply Chain discipline with at least 10 years of relevant experience preferably from Semiconductor/Electronic/Supply Chain/Manufacturing industry.
Proven expertise in sales and marketing and sales development of Semiconductor business with deep knowledge of the semiconductor industry.
Demonstrate track record of achieving growth targets. Extensive marketing management experience, particularly with successful overseas market promotion cases and deep understanding of the Semiconductor market.
Strong knowledge of market trends, industry best practices, and emerging technologies.
Proficiency in data analysis, budget management, and project coordination.
Results-oriented mindset with the ability to think creatively and strategically.
Willingness to travel when required and maintain close communication with overseas partners, conduct partner training, and expand business opportunities.
Proficient use of marketing tools and strategies such as market research, brand promotion, and digital marketing, with a solid grasp of market dynamics in the semiconductor industry.
Must be able to communicate effectively with suppliers and internal teams in both bilingual.
Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills, capable of establishing effective cooperation with individuals from diverse cultural backgrounds. abilities to effectively interact with customers and partners.
Ability to handle market competition and pressure, maintaining a positive attitude in high-intensity work environments.

title: Marketing Manager
company_info: Expressions adopts a holistic approach and promotes the use of natural products combined with professional wellness and beauty treatments, all supported by an exclusive selection of quality retail services and high technology equipment. Its wellness programmes focuses on renewing and rejuvenating the mind, body and spirit and on healthy lifestyle maintenance.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Marketing Manager to lead our marketing efforts at Expressions. As a Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for planning, implementing, and managing our organization’s social media presence across various platforms. The role involves optimizing social media posts to increase visibility, follower engagement, and brand consistency, and staying up-to-date with the latest digital technologies and social media trends. The person should have excellent communication skills and be able to express our company’s views creatively.

Responsibilities:
Develop a comprehensive social media strategy that aligns with our organization's overall marketing objectives.
Create a content calendar that includes a mix of content types (text, images, videos, etc.) and ensures consistent posting frequency.
Create high-quality, engaging, and visually appealing content for various social media platforms.
Monitor social media platforms for comments, messages, and mentions, and respond in a timely and appropriate manner.
Foster meaningful interactions with followers, building a sense of community and loyalty.
Manage and maintain our organization's social media accounts, including but not limited to Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok.
Stay up-to-date with current technologies and trends in social media, design tools, and applications.
Analyse and report on the performance and efficiency of campaigns and events on the various platforms.
Develop monthly reports on emerging social media trends that will be submitted to the management and executive teams.
Optimize content following search engine optimization (SEO).
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
Minimum 5 years of experience as a marketing manager or similar role, and demonstrating successful management of multiple platforms.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Strong understanding of various social media platforms, the audiences, and best practices.
Creative thinking and the ability to generate innovative content ideas.
Capable of editing video and familiar with video/photo software and tools to create visually appealing content.
Knowledge of SEO, keyword research, and Google Analytics.
Work Location: Macpherson – 9am to 6.30pm

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
SUPCON Technology Singapore, the leading Industrial Automation Company in China, is expanding its business overseas and seeking a highly skilled and innovative Marketing Manager to help us establish a strong international market reputation.

As the Marketing Manager, you will play a pivotal role in driving our international growth and elevating our brand presence on the global stage. Additionally, you will be responsible for ensuring that all marketing tools and documents are up to international standards, reflecting our commitment to excellence.

Key Responsibilities：
1. International Market Strategy:
Develop and execute a comprehensive marketing strategy to enhance Supcon's reputation and visibility in international markets.
Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify opportunities and challenges in different regions.
Create sub-segment strategies based on market insights and business intelligence to drive targeted growth.

2. Brand Building and Communication:
Build and strengthen the Supcon brand identity across various international platforms and media channels.
Design and implement digital marketing campaigns to support sales goals and drive brand awareness.
Lead the development and execution of marketing communications, including industrial conferences, customer seminars, and other relevant events.

3. Partnerships and Collaborations:
Identify and establish strategic partnerships with external platforms to explore new business models and collaborations.
Engage in 3rd party collaborations to enhance Supcon's market reputation and influence globally.

4. Marketing Material Standardization:
Review and improve all marketing tools and documents to align with international standards.
Ensure consistent messaging, branding, and quality across all marketing collateral.

5. Performance Measurement and Analysis:
Define key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the effectiveness of marketing campaigns.
Analyze marketing data and performance metrics to provide insights and recommendations for continuous improvement.

title: Marketing Manager
company_info: Upfrnt. Empowering landlords to thrive with their property assets. We are a proptech that offers a one click solution to all landlords' needs. visit our social media sites to find out more.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Upfrnt. Empowering landlords to thrive with their property assets.
Upfrnt is the only property manager that gives you rental income upfront.

Technology
We are an early stage Proptech.

We wish to invite applicants who aspire to be the pioneer in the marketing team to join us as we build the most innovative Proptech.

The founding team comprises of non marketing personnel and requires guidance on the most important aspect of a successful start-up. The job holder need to be an exceptionally hands on candidate. The job holder has to be proficient in day-to-day marketing activities and long-term strategizing, and strive under tight deadlines to meet the company's changing needs.

If unstructured workflow, high degree of independence and possibility of exposure to all facades of the business excites you. This role will be suitable for you.

There is a clear career progression track for the job holder.

Responsibilities
Establish positioning, identify target audiences, and develop marketing plans with specific objectives across different channels and segments.
Lead the execution of marketing programs from start to finish.
Analyze customer insights, consumer trends, market analysis, and marketing best practices to build successful strategies.
Create, maintain, and conduct analytics reporting across multiple platforms and extract key insights for future campaign development and go-to-market strategies, complete with formal proposals and recommendations on tactics.
Design, test, and evolve lead-nurturing tactics.
Help develop creative briefs and guide creative direction to meet objectives for all advertising and public-­facing communications, including print, digital, and video assets.
Conceptualize and execute on multichannel campaigns across the prospect and customer lifecycle, ensuring the alignment of communications and messaging in all channels.
Manage content and updates for customer and internal touch points, establish budget guidelines, participate in events, document business processes, and provide sales support.
Gather customer and market insights to inform outreach strategies, increase customer conversions, and generate more qualified leads.
Identify effectiveness and impact of current marketing initiatives with tracking and analysis, and optimize accordingly.
Present ideas and final deliverables to internal and external teams, and communicate with senior leaders about marketing programs, strategies, and budgets.

Requirements and skills
Proven success in developing marketing plans and campaigns
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Strong project management, multitasking, and decision-making skills
Metrics-driven marketing mind with eye for creativity
Ability to perform copywriting task at onset.
Experience with marketing automation and CRM tools
Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in marketing, business, or related field
Proficiency with online marketing and social media strategy
Proven success in designing interactive applications and networking platforms
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with constantly evolving dynamics
Motivated and resourceful individual and team player.
Visit us at www.upfrnt.co to find out more.

company_info: TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo. TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.

Why Join Us
At TikTok, our people are humble, intelligent, compassionate and creative. We create to inspire - for you, for us, and for more than 1 billion users on our platform. We lead with curiosity and aim for the highest, never shying away from taking calculated risks and embracing ambiguity as it comes. Here, the opportunities are limitless for those who dare to pursue bold ideas that exist just beyond the boundary of possibility. Join us and make impact happen with a career at TikTok.

TikTok is seeking an experienced product marketing professional with background in media to lead go-to-market for our Small Buslobal offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo. As part of the SMB Growth team, this role involves close collaboration with in-market sales leadership, global product marketing, product, acquisition, retention & lifecycle, business marketing and operations teams in a high growth environment. An ability to self-motivate, prioritize, problem solve and be the expert for our ads platform and ecosystem are key skills. Candidates must have experience working with media products in a product marketing capacity and be familiar with SMB marketing.

Responsibilities
- Define the SMB go-to-market strategy for TikTok'sever-evolving ads products
- Partner with a range of cross-functional teams across the world to ensure flawless execution against this strategy
- Partner closely with field teams and utilize data proficiently to deeply understand performance pain points, and formulate product and activation based solutions
- Adapt regional product initiatives for SMB clients, prioritizing scale, platform based and low touch solutions
- Manage growth at scale for a range of products in market; set goals, manage launches and implement activations in order to drive product adoption. Collaborate with technical and operations teams to monitor product performance
- Build robust processes, systems , tools/solutions, workflow optimization, and automation to increase operational efficiency and productivity
- Analyze and summarize product issues and pain points to recommend product enhancements

Qualifications:
- BA/BS degree or above
- 3-5+ years experience working within media industry with product marketing responsibilities
- Experience working with product teams and influencing the product roadmap with advertising products
- Experience in the ad tech or internet industry
- Knowledge and experience working in SMB marketing
- Experience driving end to end go-to-market planning and execution for advertising products
- Experience leveraging data to test hypotheses and drive business recommendations-Experience leading and delivering complex, cross-functional projects on fast-paced timelines
- A fast learner with a good sense of judgement and original thinking. Ability to thrive in ambiguity and adjust quickly to change
- Excellent communication, presentation and analytical skills
- A commercial mindset with a history of delivering against stretch performance goals
- Language proficiency in English is a must, with additional fluency in either Japanese or Korean, or another Southeast Asian language in order to communicate with local SMBs and in-market local teams is strongly preferred

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

job_category: Marketing / Public Relations, Real Estate / Property Management
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
The Leasing and Marketing Head of Department (HOD) is responsible for overseeing and managing all leasing and marketing activities within the organization. This role plays a critical role in maximizing occupancy and revenue while enhancing the property's brand image. The HOD will lead a team of leasing and marketing professionals, develop strategic plans, and collaborate with other departments to achieve business objectives.

Key Responsibilities
Leadership and Team Management:
Provide leadership, direction, and supervision to the leasing and marketing team.
Strategic Planning:
Develop and implement comprehensive leasing and marketing strategies aligned with the organization's goals and objectives.
Analyze market trends, competitor activities, and customer feedback to identify opportunities for improvement.
Property Marketing:
Develop and execute effective marketing campaigns to attract potential tenants.
Oversee the creation of marketing collateral, including brochures, websites, and social media content.
Tenant Relations:
Build and maintain strong relationships with existing tenants.
Ensure tenant concerns and inquiries are addressed to promptly and professionally.
Leasing Operations:
Oversee the leasing process, including tenant screening, negotiations, and lease signings.
Ensure compliance with leasing policies, fair housing laws, and regulations.
Monitor and report on leasing performance, occupancy rates, and revenue.
Budget Management:
Develop and manage the leasing and marketing department budget.
Monitor expenses, optimize marketing spend, and maximize ROI.
Market Research and Analysis:
Conduct market research to identify target demographics and trends.
Utilize data and analytics to make informed decisions and adjustments to marketing strategies.
Reporting and Analytics:
Prepare regular reports on leasing and marketing KPIs for senior management.
Analyze data to make data-driven recommendations and adjustments to strategies.

Job Requirements
Have knowledge about marketing and leasing of B1 property
Good communication skills and able to carry oneself well for meetings
Ability to prioritize and manage work effectively in a fast-paced environment
Other Information
Working hours: Mondays to Fridays (8.30am to 6pm)
Tai Seng area
We regret only shortlisted candidate will be notified.

title: Marketing Executive (100% WFH / Work From Home / Remote Work)
company_info: At Schweiger & Partners, we provide professional Intellectual Property management services in Europe and in Asia. We successfully combine our legal experience in IP Administration, IP prosecution and IP litigation/Anti-Counterfeiting with technical know-how in various fields including registration of products.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
It is essential that Candidates also apply from our Corporate website: https://trademarks-patents.com/marketing-executive-job-opening/ in order for applications to be processed.
Schweiger & Partners is looking for a Marketing Executive.
This is what we are aiming at: we are putting together a team of self-starters that think alike. We have already a number of such people but key positions still need to be filled. Is being part of such a motivated team a goal that is worth pursuing for you? If yes, then continue reading.

The marketing executive is an important support role in our firm. We are looking for an enthusiastic and versatile marketing executive.
Ideally, you do not know how to fill out all marketing functions. But you should be an agile technologist at heart, ready to develop yourself, and always stay up-to-date with the latest marketing trends, both digital and otherwise, with an eye on how your work impacts our overall business.
You can apply if you are passionate about marketing: you are always interested in finding out how other companies do their marketing and you enjoy running your own marketing campaigns. You think about marketing after you wake up and before you fall asleep.
You are both creative and analytical. You get what makes people tick. You enjoy being a disruptor by promoting our unique products and services.
You are eager to handle all sides of your role, be it digital, commercial, or administrative. You love to read, write and are interested to perfect yourself through learning. You are computer-savvy and that is why you love to dig into those analytics and find creative ways to improve the performance of campaigns.
That is what makes the difference between a boring character and our marketing people: they want to become the best legal marketing experts in the world. And you can become one of them.
What you will be doing
Primary function: You will do a lot of hands-on work in the actual area of marketing, most of it digital but also with print work.
Support: You can tap into our existing virtual support team for various tasks, such as for transcribing talks and podcasts, for website maintenance, for copywriting, or for programming our email campaign system.
Reporting: You will report directly to our Marketing Manager. You will also be working closely with different product owners.
Other functions: You will support other teams in our firm, among others the procurement team and the operations team.

Core Tasks/Responsibilities:
Create and execute Email Marketing Campaigns
Manage Marketing Calendars
Interact with event organizers
Co-ordinate with Marketing Manager on various marketing activities
Multiply articles across different social media platforms
Prepare KPI reports
Build and manage Contact Databases
Regularly update our CRM with contact information and opportunity details
Manage freelancers
Vetting and ensuring the quality of work produced by freelancers
Copy-write for personal emails, messages, and event descriptions and captions
Support the client-facing members in their PR and networking
Here is an extract of concrete tasks for you to familiarise with your role and responsibility:
Set-up and Run Google Ads campaigns
Run campaigns on Facebook, Linkedin and Instagram
Plan and run multiple email campaigns
Clean-up the contacts in CRM
Update Statistics from each campaign
What we expect from you
A must is that you have your own website that shows that you are able to adequately promote yourself. We will discuss your website in depth.
Diploma or Bachelors degree with an aspect in Marketing, or an equivalent job experience
Experience in Digital Marketing
Experience in running advertisements in Google Ads & Analytics, Facebook, Instagram, Tik Tok, LinkedIn, etc.
Excellent command of English and proven record of copywriting experience. You are able to express your thoughts confidently
Experience with the following software: MailChimp, WordPress, Microsoft365 (Teams, Word, Excel, Sharepoint), ERP (Netsuite), Electronic Files (ELO), Project Management (Asana). If not, you should be willing to learn.
Experience with working in an Agile Management environment will be a plus
You are a self-starter who can handle changing requirements and work under tight timelines
What you can expect from us
We offer an attractive salary (with performance-related bonuses) and a comprehensive training plan.
You will work in a dynamic and multicultural environment and you have the freedom that comes with remote office work.

It is essential that candidates also apply from our Corporate website: https://trademarks-patents.com/marketing-executive-job-opening/ in order for applications to be processed.

You’ll contribute to this vital work while further developing your skills through our award-winning employee development programs. We are a proud corporate citizen in every city where we operate and are committed to our people, our communities, and the world at large. We take this responsibility seriously and strive to make a positive impact through every endeavor. At Emerson, you’ll see firsthand that our people are at the center of everything we do. So, let’s go. Let’s think differently. Learn, collaborate, and grow. Seek opportunity. Push boundaries. Be empowered to make things better. Speed up to break through. Let’s go, together. Through our deep domain expertise and legacy of flawless execution, Emerson helps customers in critical industries like life sciences, energy, power and renewables, chemical and advanced factory automation operate more sustainably while improving productivity, energy security and reliability. With global operations and a comprehensive portfolio of software and technology, we are helping companies implement digital transformation to measurably improve their operations, conserve valuable resources and enhance their safety. We offer equitable opportunities, celebrate diversity, and embrace challenges with confidence that, together, we can make an impact across a broad spectrum of countries and industries. Whether you’re an established professional looking for a career change, an undergraduate student exploring possibilities, or a recent graduate with an advanced degree, you’ll find your chance to make a difference with Emerson. Join our team – let’s go! No calls or agencies please.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
If you are looking for an opportunity in Sales and Business Development, Emerson has an excellent role for you! The Business Development Assistant Manager / Manager will continue to be part and lead the Emerson Flame and Gas business through the Spectrex channel. This role will also lead the business expansion into new markets.
In this Role, Your Responsibilities Will Be:
· Lead and handle Spectrex distributors’ sales growth across Asia Pacific and expand into non-industrial and commercial markets in flame detection.
· Responsible for monthly sales internal reporting alongside with business forecast and market/application feedback.
· Evaluate and review distributor performance against important metrics and pivotal initiatives. At the same time, lead distributor agreements appropriately.
· Visit end customers with distributors to support applications and win orders.
· Partner with training team to provide appropriate sales and application training to distributors and customers.
· Collaborate with global teams to develop new products by providing market trend feedback such as price, volume, and competitive landscape
· Study competitive landscape and collaborate with Product Management team to develop individual country growth strategies.
· Review proposals and follow-up on deliveries to ensure high quality service to distributors and customers.
Who You Are:
You ask questions and listen closely to all issues presented by partners. You formulate a clear strategy and map the bold steps that will clearly accelerate the organization toward its strategic goals. You pick up on the need to change personal, interpersonal, and leadership behavior quickly. You facilitate an open dialogue with a wide variety of contributors and partners. You take a proactive approach to shape and influence stakeholder expectations.
For This Role, You Will Need:
· Degree in Engineering, Mechanical or any other related fields.
· At least 8 years of related sales/marketing management experience.
· Strong interpersonal, presentation and communication skills, with high EQ.
· Collaborative and a great teammate who has good situational fluency.
· Flexible to role changes in alignment with business strategies and direction.
Preferred Qualifications that Set You Apart:
· Experience in commercial and non-industrial markets (e.g. public infrastructure, waste management, car manufacturing, food & beverage, semi-conductor) is a plus.
· Experience in the field of Fire Protection Systems is an added advantage.
· Able to work independently with minimum supervision.
· Willing to travel within Asia Pacific up to 50%.
Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion
At Emerson, we are committed to fostering a culture where every employee is valued and respected for their unique experiences and perspectives. We believe a diverse and inclusive work environment contributes to the rich exchange of ideas and diversity of thoughts, that inspires innovation and brings the best solutions to our customers.
This philosophy is fundamental to living our company’s values and our responsibility to leave the world in a better place. Learn more about our Culture & Values and about Diversity, Equity & Inclusion at Emerson.

title: Marketing Manager
company_info: GS1 is a Global Standards organization with global HQ in Brussels, Belgium. GS1 unique identifiers, used with data carriers such as barcodes and RFID, permit organisations of any size to order, track, trace, deliver and pay for goods across the supply chain, anywhere in the world. The GS1 System is recognised by the International Standards Organisation (ISO), the European Standardisation Committee (CEN) and the American National Standards Institute. Today, GS1 Standards are the most widely used standards in the world for supply chain management. GS1 Singapore is established in 1987 to implement and administer the global multi-industry GS1 standards-based system of identification and communication for products, services, assets and locations. With our network of 111 GS1 member organizations (MOs) around the world today, over two million member companies in 155 countries use GS1 standards as part of their daily business communications, representing over five billion scanning transactions a day. GS1 barcodes are used at retail point-of-sales (POS) terminals, for inventory management, asset tracking, product authentication, recalls and many other applications.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
1. Strategic Marketing Management
a. Create positive & sustainable growth in GS1 standard adoption & services and GS1 membership increases through creative marketing that includes traditional marketing and digital marketing
b. Work closely with business development, membership, technical and other industry engagement teams to identify business opportunities, ascertain market demand, understand GS1 strengths and limitations so as to craft out effective marketing strategies and value propositions
c. Map out the entire year’s top level marketing work plan to effectively manage resources and chart out the marketing roadmap to communicate effectively and provide visibility and directions for all stakeholders
d. Lead the marketing team to creatively craft out the detail marketing activities for each business, service, event, channel, project initiative and campaign
e. Provide guidance, training and direction to staff in the design and development of digital media, marketing collaterals, tracking databases, processes and all marketing related issues
f. Responsible for the quality, timeliness & profitability in implementing, tracking and reporting progress of all planned events and marketing initiatives per the agreed strategy and roadmap
g. Plan, track and solicit resources to meet performance targets for respective marketing projects
h. Actively search for digital tools to automate marketing activities and enhance innovation & productivity
i. Analyse the data from online digital marketing platforms and responses from events to measure the outcome of each marketing activity and propose future directions base on the ROI data
j. Strategically implement inbound marketing by drawing customers in as they search via web-based platforms e.g. Social Media (FB, Tik Tok etc), viral videos, SEO etc.
k. Lead customers through the buyer journey: Attract, Convert, Close, Promote

2. Digital and Social Media Marketing
a. Review existing websites, e-newsletter, social media and propose enhancements or revamps to increase site visitors / followers, raise search engine ranking and improve conversion rate
b. Curate and develop compelling contents for e-newsletter (eCONNECT), social media and website to achieve thought leadership, brand positioning, leads generation and industry engagement
c. Plan and execute effective digital marketing strategies to support business initiatives and drive growth
d. Propose enhancement for the user interface and user experience of GS1 digital platforms (e.g NEPC)
e. Develop content strategies and plan / source contents to improve social media engagements to drive traffic and business growth
f. Daily analysis of campaign data and adjustments to campaign parameters to achieve lower cost per click , higher conversion rate, and improve sign-ups
g. Coordinate & Manage content creation and curation processes across channels and media platforms.

3. Event Marketing
a. Identify, plan and execute quality events with internal and external stakeholders from start to finish according to requirements, target audience, objectives and timeline
b. Manage relationships with key influencers, speakers, sponsors and partners to gain their involvement in events, both for pre-event promotion and onsite activities
c. Craft out and execute creative marketing strategies and themes to promote events’ sign-ups and sponsorships
d. In line with agreed marketing plan, to develop event budgets, seek approval and ensure adherence
e. Evaluate the benefits of GS1 support for each event and negotiate with event organisers on the terms of support and participation in selected events
f. Write contents for marketing materials and speeches
g. Orchestrate the entire implementation of each event.
h. Plan, develop and track measurements for events (e.g event survey form & online sign-ups)
i. Analyze the event’s success and propose future directions / improvements

4. Partnerships Development and Industry Engagement
a. Industry Engagement Sector Lead to promote GS1 Standards and grow memberships in Retail sector
b. Work with Global Office to deploy new standards & applications for the Retail sector, e.g. digital link
c. Develop marketing materials and strategies to effectively engage the Retail sector
d. Identify, build and manage relevant partnerships and work with industry partners to facilitate collaboration and achievement of GS1 business objectives and growth eg. Google
e. Work with Solution Partner Program (SPP) team to get Solution Partners to adopt GS1 standards for Retail sector

5. Any other duties or assignments as directed by the CEO.

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
The role:
Brand and Marketing Manager is someone who is driven and motivated by opportunity to create, manage and develop a brand. We are looking for someone who is not scared to push boundaries and take risks to redefine our product category. As a key member of the management team, he/she will be reporting and working closely with the Executive Director directly. This role is responsible for the development and management of a company's brand as well as to lead / guide and develop the marketing team.
To succeed in the role, the individual is expected and needs to be able to excel in the following areas:
(BUILD / CORE ARCHITECTURE) Lead development of the brand book and marketing plan which will outline the core operating principles and guidelines and the subsequent execution of the strategy.
(EXECUTION) Strategic marketing activities to establish the brand image and awareness according to the positioning strategy by building a roadmap for short- and long-term plan with consistent approach.
(EXECUTION) Tactical marketing activities to create and amplify brand awareness for the brand to gain more footfall into stores with a strong focus on digital and in store activations.
You are/have
The courage to create.
Driven and motivated by the opportunity to create new brands and redefine product categories.
Entrepreneurial Mindset – driving the most relevant and aligned value per dollar spent in marketing budget and manage teams productively.
Organised and systematic in your management of work.
Prefer working with smaller nimble effective teams and quicker decision-making environment.
An effective leader who is able to lead, guide, nurture and build a strong team around him or her. Someone who would like to build positive and lasting relationships with all stakeholders in a way that benefits the brand and the group.
An effervescent communicator, with the ability to impact and influence in a professional manner.
A strong strategic thinker with the intellectual capacity to think laterally and create solutions to challenges.
Want to be part of development and growth of Singaporean brand.
Fundamentally as an individual believes that business can be force for good.
Responsibilities
Brand Development: Develop brand guidelines and design new brand retail experience and product portfolio enhancements.
Strategic Planning: Develop and implement comprehensive full year marketing plan/calendar aligned with the company's growth model to drive customer acquisition, retention, and brand visibility across all regions of operation.
Team Leadership: Lead an agile and high-performing marketing team, fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and excellence.
Brand Management: Define and strengthen brand identity, ensuring consistent messaging and brand guidelines across all marketing channels and touchpoints.
Campaign Management:Lead multi-channel marketing campaigns that leverage traditional and digital channels, including social media, influencer marketing, content marketing, and partnerships, to reach target audiences and drive user engagement.
Performance Measurement: Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) and track the effectiveness of marketing initiatives to continuously optimise campaigns based on data-driven insights.
Stakeholder Management:Collaborate closely with internal teams to ensure alignment and coordination in executing marketing initiatives and achieving business objectives.
Budget Management: Develop and manage the marketing budget, allocating resources effectively to maximize return on investment and drive cost-efficient marketing campaigns.
Requirements
6 – 10 years’ experience in brand or product marketing and/or business development preferably in the F&B, FMCG, retail or hospitality industries, (ideally in the B2C Retail space).
Degree in Business/Marketing/ from a recognised university.
Exceptional knowledge in marketing disciplines, specifically in market positioning, customer and business segmentation, go-to-market strategies, and brand management.
Exceptional knowledge and passion in Branding, specifically the ability to create a brand identity for the brand (lead external agencies / internal resources independently once direction has been set).
Solid track record in executing sophisticated brand or product launch programs across various offline and online channels that drive measurable business outcomes.
Keen eye for design and aesthetics.
Strong understanding of the Southeast Asian market, cultural nuances and regional consumer behaviour is a plus.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
(I) Marketing and Sales Functions

a) Budget plan
o Gather accurate data for developing half-yearly budget plan.
o Follow up with customers to achieve sales as per budget plan.
o Study & Understand the Budget plan allocated to the team, work toward achieving the budget plan and target that set forth.
o Organise discussion & recovery plan on the budget plan gap with immediate supervisor.

b) Sales & Marketing Activities
o Obtain latest product / line-up information & demos from HQ.
o Obtain customer / market information in region of responsibility.
o Map customers to product roadmap of Company’s Strategy.
o Introduce company’s latest technologies to relevant customers.
o Arrange demos to individual / group customer (marketing event).
o Identify best strategy / business model for each customer / product.
o Coordinate efforts with biz partners to realise business (based on business model).
o Track and facilitate customer project development.
o Obtain / negotiate pricing with HQ to win sales order.
o Negotiate pricing with Customers to maintain profitability as set forth.
o Gather latest updates information from customers and update to internal system.
o Plan buffer stock based on customer MP schedule and company’s components supply.
o Follow up and ensure payment as per customer credit ratings.

c) Sales and Marketing Report
o Project sheet update / Sales Analysis Report / Sales Trips Report or any adhoc report.
o Help and Coordinate with Market research activities based on supervisor instructions
o Provide marketing report on market / product / country specific whenever deemed necessary.

(II) Internal Communications

d) Interface with HQ
o Obtain new technologies and product roadmap from HQ
o Arrangement of samples (new product) and demo from HQ.
o Price negotiation with HQ if our buying price cannot meet customer request price or market pricing
o Delivery negotiation if customer facing delivery problems
o Market information sharing and update with HQ counterpart.

e) Interface with Inter-departments
o Regular meeting and planning with PSI group on delivery / demand input
o Close communication within Sales & Marketing Dept. to ensure sales objective is met and sharing of marketing / customer information.
o Keep communication with AR (Accounts) to ensure payment delivery is being met and review on customer financial status regularly
o Close interface with Customer Service team to ensure delivery commitment to customer and pull-in activities to increase sales.
o Interface with Technical Team to develop demo & jig/ support product information/ samples/ communication with Japan engineers.

REQUIREMENT
• Min Diploma qualification with relevant areas of studies
• At least 3 years working experiences in sales & marketing related activities
• Knowledge of Electronics Components; Display / LCD will be an added advantage.

title: Senior Strategic Alliance and Marketing Manager
company_info: MSD PHARMA (SINGAPORE) PTE. LTD. Today’s MSD is a global healthcare leader working to help the world be well. MSD is a tradename of Merck & Co., Inc., with headquarters in Whitehouse Station, N.J., U.S.A. Through our prescription medicines, vaccines, biologic therapies, and consumer care and animal health products, we work with customers and operate in more than 140 countries to deliver innovative health solutions. We also demonstrate our commitment to increasing access to healthcare through far-reaching policies, programs and partnerships. Whatever your career path – whether it’s pursuing original science in the laboratory, working directly with our customers, manufacturing quality products or supporting our business in another way – MSD offers opportunities to develop and expand your career while making a true difference in people’s lives. Learn more about who we are as a company and to discover the many reasons to join MSD.
job_category: Consulting, Environment / Health, General Management, Healthcare / Pharmaceutical, Medical / Therapy Services
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Your opportunity to join a multi-award-winning leading biopharmaceutical company and be part of the best in class marketing team
Bring your entrepreneurial curiosity and learning spirit into a career of purpose and personal growth
You will engage with key stakeholders and commercial leaders, providing critical insights to help shape the best business outcome, aligned with overall business objectives and in line with operational requirements
Our Oncology team is dedicated to delivering breakthrough innovations that extend and improve the lives of cancer patients worldwide. Our team of forward-thinking individuals achieve this through an unwavering commitment to support accessibility to medicine, providing new therapeutic solutions, and collaborating with governments and payers to ensure that people who need medicines have access to them. Our focus is on innovation and launch execution excellence; we translate breakthrough science into innovative medicines that help people with cancer across the globe.
Our Marketing team are passionate about bringing our medicines and vaccines to our customers around the world. Through digital listening and patient analytics, we are able to understand our customers’ needs and strive to provide solutions to meet them.
What will you do:
Alliance partnerships (40%):
Enhance strategic relationship with alliance partners and stakeholders.
Lead the development of alliance brand strategic planning, coordination and execution of commercial activities and key performance metrics.
Foster an optimal cross functional team collaboration to optimize the alliance business.
Business innovation/ development overall Oncology (60%):
Develop overall pan tumour plan and market development strategies to grow the overall oncology business in Singapore.
Work closely with the sales and marketing team to understand where opportunities are the most appropriate to grow, protect or optimize the business.
Actively drives identification of opportunities within Singapore and Brunei Market.
Lead commercial innovations programs from end to end in terms of identification of opportunities, business case proposal, evaluation, and implementation.
Support strategic account manager in Brunei to realize the growth ambition of oncology in Brunei by providing marketing support in terms of communication materials and activities, stocks forecasting and management.
Manage marketing operation for in-line product range.
Keep abreast with the evolving healthcare industry trends, policy trends and scientific advancement of the oncology space.
Accountabilities/ KPIs:
Financial objectives of alliance brands
Perform regular country reviews, alliance reporting, monitors market trends, customer insights, competitor activities, and support sales force effectiveness, to identify and capture potential opportunities and address potential issues.
KPI monitoring meeting
Marketing planning, marketing material development & review, and forecasting
Work closely with local governance lead and regional steering committee to maximize synergies in alliance partnership.
Achieve the overall oncology business ambition (in terms of both financial goals and impact on oncology patients) for both Singapore and Brunei.
Support BUD in overall pan tumour financial forecasting.
Business case development, presentation, execution and evaluation for identified opportunities.
Forecasting accuracy and stock management for in line brands and Brunei key oncology products.
What should you have:
7 to 10 years' relevant industry experience in sales and marketing, with experience in a sales & marketing role.
Relevant Bachelor's degree qualification or higher in life sciences, pharmacy or related subjects.
Oncology sales & marketing experience
Alliance partnership management experience
Business development experience.
Strong customer focus including the desire to understand customer's needs and tailor appropriate solutions.
Demonstrated successful commercial track record.
Strategic leadership skills and vision
Effective communication
We are proud to be a company that embraces the value of bringing diverse, talented, and committed people together. The fastest way to breakthrough innovation is when diverse ideas come together in an inclusive environment. We encourage our colleagues to respectfully challenge one another’s thinking and approach problems collectively. We are an equal opportunity employer, committed to fostering an inclusive and diverse workplace.

Who we are …
We are known as Merck & Co., Inc., Rahway, New Jersey, USA in the United States and Canada and MSD everywhere else. For more than a century, we have been inventing for life, bringing forward medicines and vaccines for many of the world's most challenging diseases. Today, our company continues to be at the forefront of research to deliver innovative health solutions and advance the prevention and treatment of diseases that threaten people and animals around the world.

What we look for …
Imagine getting up in the morning for a job as important as helping to save and improve lives around the world. Here, you have that opportunity. You can put your empathy, creativity, digital mastery, or scientific genius to work in collaboration with a diverse group of colleagues who pursue and bring hope to countless people who are battling some of the most challenging diseases of our time. Our team is constantly evolving, so if you are among the intellectually curious, join us—and start making your impact today.

title: Regional Marketing Communications Manager
company_info: TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS (SINGAPORE) PTE. LTD.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description

The Manager creates, manages, and delivers regional internal and external communications across the APAC region. The incumbent will develop communications that enable stakeholders to understand and embrace corporate and regional strategy, business priorities, value propositions, brand identity, and organizational changes. This individual collaborates with corporate and country communications leads to ensure connection and alignment.The right candidate should have comprehensive experience in external, internal, and crisis communications as well as social media and a proven track record of managing results-driven communications programs. A high degree of creativity and technology domain knowledge is a plus

Internal Communications and Digital Engagement
Develop a regional employee communications strategy that strengthens culture and keeps employees informed and engaged with clear, purposeful and strategic content.
Work directly with global business leaders and executives to identify needs, objectives and strategies for effective and meaningful communications (e.g., scripts, speeches and presentations) in the APAC region.
Contribute to our storytelling efforts by using global and locally-relevant data points, colleague and customer stories and insights to generate positive impressions in relevant media.
Serve as a key point of contact for issues management working closely with legal, HR, business and sales teams – successfully managing complex, fast-moving and unexpected communications challenges and being able to deal with ambiguity
Work with the corporate and regional communications teams to ensure coordinated, accurate, consistent and effective content and messages.
Work directly with business leaders to identify, drive and encourage the continued evolution and adoption of digital communication tools
Analyze metrics of digital platforms and advise on the evolution of the communications channels and content included in each.
Oversee content management of APAC intranet (SharePoint), helping to drive engagement in the region and ensure consistent messaging and alignment with the global strategy.
Serve as editor of APAC newsletter and executive messaging; advise on cadence and strategy.
External Communications
Manage external communications, including media relations, executive thought leadership, community relations, crisis communications, global responsibility and social media content strategy.
Manage PR agency to lead the preparation and distribution of company news and information to regional business and trade media outlets, and in development of media relations plans.
Ensure alignment with the company's strategic direction across all of the region’s external communications channels to ensure consistent messaging and positive brand positioning.
Serve as a spokesperson to local media in the APAC region.
Work with APAC leadership to enhance efforts to generate favorable opinion about the market in the region, and garner local and regional media attention.
Respond to requests for information from the media.
Assist leaders to prepare and deliver external presentations.
General:
Collaborate with the Corporate Communications team to align on global messaging, communications, strategy and initiatives such as the company’s Global Responsibility program.
Serve as a responsive, quality-focused, trusted partner for communications needs throughout the region.
Establish and maintain positive, effective and proactive relationships with internal and external stakeholders.

Requirements:
10 + years of relevant work experience.
Bachelor's Degree with Communications, Public Relations, Journalism, Marketing or closely related field of study or equivalent years of experience Field of Study preferred. Bachelor's Degree required.
Proven management experience, outstanding written and verbal English communications skills, proficient with Microsoft Office Suite, general experience in SharePoint design, site improvement and analytics.
Occasional non-standard work hours or overtime as business requires. On-call availability required as necessary. Professional, office environment. Some travel required.
Resourceful, energetic self-starter; confident in dealing with senior executives; Able to execute instructions and to request clarification when needed.
Able to perform basic mathematical calculations.
Able to recognize and attend to important details with accuracy and efficiency.
Able to communicate clearly and convey necessary information. Able to create and conduct formal presentations.
Able to interact effectively with all levels of management.
Able to negotiate skillfully, promote/sell ideas persuasively, and close transactions with mutually beneficial results.
Possesses strong multi-cultural interpersonal skills.
Possesses strong leadership skills with a willingness to lead, create new ideas, and be assertive.
Possesses strong organizational and time management skills, driving tasks to completion.
Able to constructively work under stress and pressure when faced with high workloads and deadlines.
Able to maintain and promote social, ethical, and organizational standards in conducting internal and external business activities.
Able to work independently with minimum supervision. Able to maintain confidentiality of sensitive information.

Source, build and maintain relationships with our partners, working closely to design and manufacturer new product models.
You would be required to lead and drive product development, conducting consumer and market research, define product requirements, lead and drive product launches, developing and maintaining user manuals and manage product roadmaps and timelines.
Partner with software development on the product requirements and oversee smart home integration for the product category.
Identify and prioritize new product opportunities for the product category, based on market trends, customer needs and competitive analysis.

Bachelor’s degree in a relevant discipline e.g., Management, Marketing, Commerce, Engineering or Finance.
Minimum of 8 years’ relevant working experience in B2B product management experience with ability to independently lead the agenda.
No fear of the unknown. You have to be an analytical self-starter, comfortable with complete uncertainty as we look to venture into new product lines or models. You need to be able to dive in and test all angles without supervision.
Data driven. You need to be able to structure, quantify and qualify information on product research, and present this to stakeholders explaining the logic. Comfort with spreadsheet software and data modelling is essential.
Strong Business acumen – Understanding of the wider environment within which our business operates and implications of e.g., trends / shifts in sustainability and consumer perception, brand owners’ opportunity & challenges, and being able to drive actionable insights and articulate what products/services to offer to accelerate profitable growth.

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
This is a 1 year fixed-term contract. Extension/conversion will be subjected to business needs and performance.

MAIN PURPOSE
The role of the Marketing Executive, NARS Cosmetics and Drunk Elephant, will play a critical role in supporting Marketing Manager on initiatives to ensure the brand’s objectives are met. The ideal candidate represents both the NARS and Drunk Elephant brand, is a creative, detailed, outgoing individual, with hands-on experience with event planning and an eye for beauty.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

Public Relations
• Assist the Marketing Manager to plan and execute public relations strategies for the brand
• Organize and execute promotional events
• Manage relationships with media outlets, influencers, makeup artists
• Track and measure PR results
• Stay up to date with industry trends and best practices
• Work closely with agency partners to execute PR campaigns
• Represent the brand at industry events

Events
• Support the Marketing Managing by developing event concepts and proposals, to achieve brand ambition and objectives
• Collaborate with global and regional stakeholders, ensuring events are aligned with brand guidelines
• Coordinate with third-party vendors
• Track and measure event results

Visual Merchandising
• Develop and execute visual merchandising plans for all channels, ensures visual merchandising instore meets brand guidelines, reflects new launches and discontinuations in a timely and accurate manner
• Collaborate with global and regional stakeholders, to create traffic stopping displays within the given budget

REQUIREMENTS
• Degree in Business/Marketing/Mass Communication or related field
• 3+ years of relevant marketing experience, preferably in the beauty industry
• Keen interest in cosmetics is a MUST
• Fluent in English, both written and verbal
• Familiarity with Photoshop and graphic design a plus
• Learning agility and proven speed in picking up skills quickly
• Well organized, detailed, with a strong sense of urgency and good time management skills
• Self-motivated team player committed to work in a fast-paced retail environment

title: Sales Manager
company_info: Mothercare is a specialist retailer of products for mothers-to-be, babies and children up to the age of eight. Its rapidly growing network of retail stores span from the United Kingdom to international franchises across most of Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Australia, China and the Far East. Mothercare has a strong reputation for specialism, quality, safety and innovation in providing products and services for mothers, mothers-to-be, babies and young children. Mothercare Singapore started in 1984 and now has a network of 13 stores island-wide. Our flagship store is located on Level 3 of Harbourfront Centre. The 6,500 square feet store showcases our full range of children's furniture, pushchairs, car seats and travel cots, and is recognised by the Guinness Book of World Records as having the largest range of baby equipment in Singapore. Our vision and mission are to be the leading parenting retailer in Singapore and the number one choice to meet the parenting needs and aspirations of our customers. Our team of retail advisors are well-trained to provide accurate and non-biased product recommendations and are encouraged to go the extra mile for their customers. We understand how frustrating, exhausting, joyful and rewarding the parenting process can be and here at Mothercare, we do our utmost to make shopping with kids or for kids a wonderful experience for our customers. To help us deliver on our ambitions, we need great people. People who are passionate about parenting - nurturing and guiding our customers, who own the issues, who pull together to make the business better and deliver exceptional performance day after day. Have you got the DNA to succeed at Mothercare? If your answer is yes, we want to hear from you right now.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
As a sales team leader, your primary responsibilities are to guide, train, and mentor your team while establishing sales quotas and goals and developing sales plans. You'll analyze sales data, assign sales territories, and build your team while also serving as the primary customer interface.

You'll be responsible for maintaining and developing strategic relationships with new and existing customers, providing the best solutions and services to meet their needs. You'll drive revenue and margin growth, exceed business objectives with key account clients, and deliver high-quality client presentations and proposals.

To accomplish this, you'll need to prospect new leads and convert them into business opportunities. You'll also be responsible for building sales presentations and supporting sales pipelines. Collaboration with team leads on channel strategy, sales reports, and retail range planning is also required. Strong English communication skills, both written and verbal, are essential for this role.


Job Role

Sales Management
Meet sales targets by working collaboratively with the Senior Sales & Marketing Manager and Purchasing & Brand Manager to manage the existing pipeline and identify new business opportunities.
Take the lead in developing proposals and presentations to create new business opportunities and nurture partnerships with Key Account Executives.
Develop effective strategies and positions by analyzing and selecting new retailers.
Take personal ownership of motivation, performance tracking, and metric reporting.

Key Responsibilities
Keep a close eye on industry trends and customer drivers and regularly meet with management and stakeholders to discuss strategy.
Manage the proposal response process, including creating content, gathering inputs from various sources, and ensuring compliance with detailed Request for Sales Proposal (RFSP) requirements.
Identify new leads, reach out to decision-makers, screen potential opportunities, select deals in line with strategy, and lead and coordinate pitch logistics.
Develop and implement an outbound sales and business development strategy, along with sales processes, structure, and best practices across the company.
Support deal structure and pricing with business value analysis and negotiate prices for proactive bids and proposals.
Stay up-to-date with industry knowledge and share it through education, networking, events, and presentations.

Competencies
Demonstrated success in B2B sales and negotiation
Strong communication skills, both verbal and written
Experience with various sales techniques
Proficiency in data analysis, forecasting, and budgeting
Ability to plan and manage resources effectively
Proficiency in using MS Excel and MS PowerPoint for sales-related tasks.

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Your Role
We are looking for an experienced Brand Executive / Marketing Executive to support the Senior Marketing Manager in planning and executing Marketing calendar of activities to ensure smooth and timely execution of all campaigns, product launches and projects. You will be involved in the Marketing Communications, Product Management and Market Intelligence.
What Will You Do
Marketing Communications
To plan, create and implement marketing campaigns and promotions including both ATL and BTL for diverse portfolio of categories.
To manage the campaigns' timeline and new product launches
To prepare, monitor, and present accurate and timely campaign progress and post-mortem report and analysis to measure campaign effectiveness, derive key learning for business growth and decision-making.
To liaise, align, and coordinate with internal and external stakeholders to conceptualize and ensure smooth execution of campaigns.
To prepare sales sell-in kit and product deck for new product launches.
To manage A&P budget for the assigned portfolio, forecasting and optimise spends.
To support the teams on both aspects of marketing and administration.
To maintain marketing data, categories’ assets, and materials
Other ad-hoc duties as assigned
Product Management
To manage and maintain the development of the product packaging designs (Domestic market, Malaysia market & International markets) to ensure correct changes are being implemented and timely submission of artworks.
To develop new products that are aligned with the business and market needs using relevant market and consumer’s insights and trends.
To work closely with key stakeholders to ensure clear communication and timely approvals.
To apply to the relevant authorities for approval on packaging.
To update & maintain product information, packaging artworks, pack shots, catalogue, corporate website, product specifications and sales listing in materials whenever required
Market Intelligence
To manage external and internal data to analysis and review opportunities for business growth on a stipulated period.
To gather and monitor market and consumer trend and competitive information.
To conduct on-ground market visits to trade channels to understand consumers’ buying behaviours and upcoming product trends.
What Do You Need
At least a Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing or related field
Minimum 1-2 years of marketing experience, preferably in the Fast Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG)
Meticulous and have a keen eye for details
Possess a high degree of initiative, self-motivated and able to multitask
Ability to Communicate and collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to ensure campaigns/project objectives are aligned and executed smoothly and timely
